name: Blink (itch) (ma_jetteleger)
description:
[PROTOTYPE]

Blink is an experiment to bridge the gap between graph-type movement and traditional platforming design. Escape the limits of gravity with the ability to blink and dash, drawing geometrical and angular patterns through space to overcome obstacles.

How to play :

- A to move left
- D to move right
- Space to jump
- Click and hold to slow down time
- Drag the mouse slightly while holding it down to design the shape of your dash
- Alt-F4 to quit the game (if you downloaded the game on Windows)

Try and dash through gaps and objects to progress and discover secrets

Optional controls :

- Shift to try a different dash design sequence
- Ctrl to toggle between 4-direction and 8-direction dashing
- Esc to teleport back to the last checkpoint (if you're stuck)
